target_audience.primary_persona: E-commerce store owners using Thelia 3 who need a modern, responsive front-office template for their online shop
secondary_personas: Web developers and agencies building Thelia-based e-commerce sites
Small-to-medium business owners managing their own online stores
Thelia community members looking for modern template alternatives
pain_points: Default Thelia templates are outdated and lack modern UX patterns
Need for responsive, mobile-friendly e-commerce experience
Want AJAX-based cart interactions without page reloads
Require customer engagement features like wishlists and recently viewed products
Need easy installation and configuration for Thelia 3 environment
goals: Provide a beautiful, conversion-optimized shopping experience
Reduce cart abandonment with smooth checkout flow
Enable customers to save favorites and track viewed products
target_audience.usage_context: Production e-commerce websites running Thelia 3 CMS, typically deployed with DDEV for development and standard PHP hosting for production

product_vision.one_liner: A modern, responsive e-commerce template for Thelia 3 with Alpine.js interactivity and Tailwind CSS styling
product_vision.problem_statement: Thelia 3 users need a modern, feature-rich front-office template that provides excellent UX for their customers while being easy to customize and maintain
product_vision.value_proposition: Moderna delivers a polished, production-ready e-commerce template with wishlist, recently viewed products, AJAX cart, multi-address checkout, and responsive design - all built on modern tech stack (Alpine.js, Tailwind CSS) that's easy to customize
success_metrics: Conversion rate improvement compared to default templates
Reduced page load times with optimized assets
Mobile usability score on Google PageSpeed Insights
Customer engagement metrics (wishlist usage, time on site)

existing_features: Responsive homepage with hero highlights slider
Product detail pages with image gallery
Complete checkout flow (cart → delivery → payment → confirmation)
known_gaps: Password change API not implemented (TODO in account.html.twig)
Newsletter form not connected to backend
technical_debt: Some inline styles and scripts in Twig templates

differentiators: Built specifically for Thelia 3 with Twig (dev-twig branch)
Modern stack: Alpine.js + Tailwind CSS + Stimulus
Built-in wishlist with localStorage + server sync
Clean, minimal design focused on conversions
Easy installation with SQL setup scripts
competitive_context.market_position: Premium-quality open-source Thelia 3 template targeting store owners who want modern UX without switching platforms, positioned between basic default templates and expensive commercial solutions

technical: Must work with Thelia 3 (dev-twig branch) - not compatible with Thelia 2
Depends on Thelia's API endpoints and Propel ORM
Must use DDEV for development environment
Webpack Encore required for asset building
